title: Samsung has updated these devices to Android 12
content:
Android 12 is still a very new version of the platform, but Samsung is launching the update for its Galaxy devices less than a month after Google’s own Pixel phones. More devices will be updated over the coming months, and Samsung has confirmed a preliminary list of devices that will be updated.

more…

The post Samsung has updated these devices to Android 12 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung is one of the first device makers to release Android 12 on its smartphones and tablets, and we have a full list of their progress.
